scenarios.title: Basic Network Performance Optimization - Small Enterprise
scenarios.issue: Application performance degradation reported by users. Network latency and throughput issues identified across WAN links.
scenarios.analysis: Bandwidth utilization analysis, latency measurements, packet loss investigation, QoS policy review, application flow analysis.
scenarios.optimization: Implement traffic shaping, optimize QoS policies, upgrade critical links, deploy caching solutions, tune TCP parameters.
scenarios.expert_notes: Expert insight based on industry best practices.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Baseline measurements are crucial for identifying performance degradation.

scenarios.title: Basic Database Query Optimization - Government
scenarios.problem: Critical database queries experiencing slow response times affecting business applications during peak hours.
scenarios.investigation: Query execution plan analysis, index utilization review, resource contention identification, statistics update verification.
scenarios.solution: Optimize query structure, create targeted indexes, implement query caching, partition large tables, tune database parameters.
scenarios.expert_notes: Expert insight based on industry best practices.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Baseline measurements are crucial for identifying performance degradation.
